data_details.label: Working memory
data_details.docstring: All the facts in the working memory of current step

data_details.label: Fired rules from start
data_details.docstring: Rules fired since the beginning of the process in sequence

data_details.label: Goals/Subgoals
data_details.docstring: Goal and subgoals (with their respective rule) until this step. Achieved subgoals should be removed

data_details.label: Remark
data_details.docstring: Can be used for any additional explanation

data: Rule 1 is fired, added K into Working Memory
Rule 7 is fired, added W into Working Memory
Rule 10 is fired, added R into Working Memory
Rule 4 is fired, added H into Working Memory
Rule 3 is fired, added C into Working Memory
No rule can be fired, therefore forward chaining process is terminated. 'C' is the final decision.
